entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Papineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:57 a.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon. Rain beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near noon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
